description.en: PKT is available for purchase from ICO marketplace Cryptonomos. During the Initial Coin Offering (ICO) pre-sale campaign, the company collected more than $3.5 million in sales. This included $1 million from the American fund Uncharted Capital and over $1 million from Allrise Financial Group. Backed by the Playkey Foundation - the ecosystem’s regulating body - PKT provides gamers with an affordable way of playing top rated games on any web-enabled device, and rewards Playkey’s global network of service providers for sharing their processing power.
